1 /* File: Element.h
2  * Author: David Lordan, UMass Lowell Computer Science
3  * david_lordan@student.uml.edu
4  *
5  * Created on October 11th, 2014, 4:46 PM, modified on Oct 23rd at 4:43 PM to
6  * add additional documentation.
7  *
8  * This is the header file for the Element class, which is
9  * used when reading an XML file. Each object of the class can store
10  * a tag's name, what line it was found on, the element content, the element's
11  * attributes, its level within an element tree, children and a reference to it's parent.
12  * Much of the design for this class was taken from the lecture notes of Prof.
13  * Jesse Heines of UMass Lowell for the Fall 2014 91.204-Computing IV class.
14  */
